scripts.link-chassis: cd node_modules/@chassis && npm link @chassis/core && npm link @chassis/gulp && cd ../..
scripts.bundle-webcomponents: npm run bundle-chassis-select && npm run bundle-chassis-datalist && npm run bundle-chassis-layout
scripts.build: npm run link-chassis && npm run build-webcomponents && npm run bundle-webcomponents && gulp build
scripts.build-chassis-select: build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-select webcomponents/dist --es5 && npm run bundle-chassis-select && gulp build
scripts.build-chassis-options: build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-options webcomponents/dist --es5 && npm run bundle-chassis-select && gulp build
